verses.text: ‘\w Had|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*’ \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*

‘\w Had|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*,

then \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* they’d have \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w* \w us|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w*, when \w their|strong="H1104"\w* anger was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w us|strong="H1104"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w*’ve \w swept|strong="H5674"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w torrent|strong="H5158"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* clean:

\w then|strong="H5674"\w* most sure \w would|strong="H5315"\w*’ve \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* clean \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wild seething \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.’

Blest \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w torn|strong="H2964"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*.

\w We|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w like|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* just \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* fowler. \w The|strong="H7665"\w* \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5828"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* Creator \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.
